database.name: VIEW SIM_ORDERLINE_PARTIAL_V
database.view: SELECT COALESCE(oil.sim_orderimportline_id, '-') || p.c_order_id AS sim_orderline_partial_v_id, p.ad_client_id, p.ad_org_id, p.isactive, p.updated, p.updatedby, p.created, p.createdby, p.c_order_id, p.documentno, p.docstatus, p.em_sim_is_in_folio, p.em_sim_folioimport_id, pl.em_sim_orderimportline_id, p.em_sim_datetoforwarder AS datetoforwarder, fo.dateshipment, fo.datearrival, fo.dateaproxwarehouse, fo.datewarehouse, pl.qtyordered, pl.em_sim_advalorem AS advalorem, pl.em_sim_tlc_disc_advalorem AS tlc, iv.c_invoice_id, iv.em_scr_physical_documentno AS physical_documentno, iv.dateinvoiced, iv.em_sco_firstduedate AS facvencimiento, iv.totalpaid, iv.grandtotal, COALESCE((SELECT sum(m_inoutline.movementqty) AS sum FROM m_inoutline WHERE m_inoutline.c_orderline_id = pl.c_orderline_id), 0) AS qtyreceipt FROM c_order p JOIN c_orderline pl ON p.c_order_id = pl.c_order_id JOIN sim_orderimportline oil ON oil.sim_orderimportline_id = pl.em_sim_orderimportline_id LEFT JOIN sim_folioimport fo ON p.em_sim_folioimport_id = fo.sim_folioimport_id LEFT JOIN c_invoiceline ivl ON pl.c_orderline_id = ivl.c_orderline_id LEFT JOIN c_invoice iv ON iv.c_invoice_id = ivl.c_invoice_id WHERE p.em_sim_is_import = 'Y'
